link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/reference http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-reference.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2010/validation-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/filter/aspect-cover http://www.xbrl.org/2010/aspect-cover-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd

gen:link.msg:message: ERROR: The value of "Date of end of reporting period" MUST be reported.

va:valueAssertion.test: ($v1 = false() and empty($v2)) or ($v1 = true() and not(empty($v2)))

gen:link.msg:message: ERROR: Date of audit of financial statements MUST be reported only if submitting audited annual financial statements

va:valueAssertion.test: ($v1 = false() and not(empty($v2)) and not(empty($v3)) and not(empty($v4))) or ($v1 = true() and not(empty($v5)))

gen:link.msg:message: ERROR: If person is not resident of South Africa, Country of origin, Passport number and Date of birth MUST be provided. South African residents MUST disclose their Identity number

va:valueAssertion.test: (($v1 = true() and $v2 = false() and $v3 = false()) or ($v1 = false() and $v2 = true() and $v3 = false()) or ($v1 = false() and $v2 = false() and $v3 = true())) and count($v4) > 0

gen:link.msg:message: ERROR: Annual Financial Statements MUST be either audited, independently compiled or internally compiled

va:valueAssertion.test: ($v1 = false() and empty($v2)) or ($v1 = true() and not(empty($v2)))

gen:link.msg:message: ERROR: Date of independent review of financial statements MUST be reported only if submitting independently compiled and reported on annual financial statements
ERROR: Company with a Public Interest Score exceeding 350 MUST submit audited annual financial statements
ERROR: Auditor name MUST be provided for any audited financial statement
ERROR: Company with a Public Interest Score exceeding 500 MUST have the social and ethics committee disclosed
ERROR: For every director or prescribed officer, Total remuneration MUST be provided

va:valueAssertion.test: ($v1 = true() and (($v2 != xs:QName('cipc-ca-enum:NotApplicable')) or ($v3 != xs:QName('cipc-ca-enum:NotApplicable')) or ($v4 != xs:QName('cipc-ca-enum:NotApplicable')) or ($v5 != xs:QName('cipc-ca-enum:NotApplicable')) or ($v6 != xs:QName('cipc-ca-enum:NotApplicable')) or ($v7 != xs:QName('cipc-ca-enum:NotApplicable')) or ($v8 != xs:QName('cipc-ca-enum:NotApplicable')) or ($v9 != xs:QName('cipc-ca-enum:NotApplicable')))) or $v1 = false()

gen:link.msg:message: ERROR: If Solvency and Liquidity test are satisfied, at least one reason MUST be provided

va:valueAssertion.test: (($v1 != xs:QName('cipc-ca-enum:NotApplicable')) and not(empty($v2))) or ($v1 = xs:QName('cipc-ca-enum:NotApplicable') and empty($v2))

gen:link.msg:message: ERROR: Description MUST be provided for other reason Solvency and Liquidity test were performed

va:valueAssertion.test: ($v1 = true() and not(empty($v2))) or ($v1 = false() and empty($v2))

gen:link.msg:message: ERROR: For all changes in Companies Registry, Description of changes MUST be provided

va:valueAssertion.test: ($v1 = true() and not(empty($v2))) or ($v1 = false() and empty($v2))

gen:link.msg:message: ERROR: For all changes in Companies Registry, Description of changes MUST be provided

va:valueAssertion.test: ($v1 = true() and not(empty($v2))) or ($v1 = false() and empty($v2))

gen:link.msg:message: ERROR: For all changes in Companies Registry, Description of changes MUST be provided

va:valueAssertion.test: ($v1 = true() and not(empty($v2))) or ($v1 = false() and empty($v2))

gen:link.msg:message: ERROR: For all changes in Companies Registry, Description of changes MUST be provided

va:valueAssertion.test: ($v1 = true() and not(empty($v2))) or ($v1 = false() and empty($v2))

gen:link.msg:message: ERROR: For all changes in Companies Registry, Description of changes MUST be provided

va:valueAssertion.test: ($v1 = true() and not(empty($v2))) or ($v1 = false() and empty($v2))

gen:link.msg:message: ERROR: For all changes in Companies Registry, Description of changes MUST be provided
ERROR: Independent reviewer's name MUST be provided for any independently reviewed financial statement
ERROR: The value of "Turnover" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
WARNING: The value of "Increase (decrease) in equity" SHOULD be reported for the current reporting period (if applicable).
WARNING: The value of "Cash and cash equivalents" SHOULD be reported for the current reporting period (if applicable).
WARNING: The value of "Increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents" SHOULD be reported for the current reporting period (if applicable).
WARNING: The value of "Cash flows from (used in) financing activities" SHOULD be reported for the current reporting period (if applicable).
WARNING: The value of "Cash flows from (used in) investing activities" SHOULD be reported for the current reporting period (if applicable).
WARNING: The value of "Cash flows from (used in) operating activities" SHOULD be reported for the current reporting period (if applicable).
WARNING: The value of "Comprehensive income" SHOULD be reported for the current reporting period (if applicable).
WARNING: The value of "Other comprehensive income" SHOULD be reported for the current reporting period (if applicable).
WARNING: The value of "Tax expense (income), continuing operations" SHOULD be reported for the current reporting period (if applicable).
WARNING: The value of "Profit (loss)" SHOULD be reported for the current reporting period (if applicable).
WARNING: The value of "Profit (loss) before tax" SHOULD be reported for the current reporting period (if applicable).
WARNING: The value of "Assets" SHOULD be reported for the current reporting period (if applicable).
WARNING: The value of "Equity" SHOULD be reported for the current reporting period (if applicable).
WARNING: The value of "Equity and liabilities" SHOULD be reported for the current reporting period (if applicable).
ERROR: The value of "Disclosure of directors' responsibility [text block]" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Date of approval of annual financial statements" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Disclosure of directors' report [text block]" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Date of publication of financial statements" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Declaration of signature by authorised director" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Declaration of director's report presence" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Declaration of auditor's report presence" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Professional designation of individual responsible for preparation or supervising preparation of financial statements" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Name of individual responsible for preparation or supervising preparation of financial statements" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Level of rounding used in financial statements" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Description of presentation currency" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Period covered by financial statements" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Description of nature of financial statements" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Postal address same as business address" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Business address, country" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Business address, city" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Business address, postal code" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Business address, street name" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Type of company" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Full registered name of company" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Principal place of business of company" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Principal business of company" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Email address of company" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Liabilities" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Maximum number of individuals with beneficial interest in securities of company, or members in case of non profit company" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Average number of employees" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Registration number of company" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Name of designated person responsible for compliance" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Public interest score" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: The value of "Customer code" MUST be reported for the current reporting period.
ERROR: "Public interest score" IS NOT calculated properly.
ERROR: Each mandatory element reported with a nil value MUST have a footnote attached.
ERROR: 'Turnover' and 'Liabilities' MUST have a footnote attached if reported with 0.
